verses.verse: Thou <S%G4771><s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5043>son,<s%> be <S%G1743>strong<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

No <S%G3762>man<s%> that <S%G4754>warreth<s%> entangleth himself <S%G1707>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4230>affairs<s%> of this <S%G979>life;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G700>please<s%> him who hath chosen him to be a <S%G4758>soldier.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> strive for <S%G118>masteries,<s%> yet is he <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4737>crowned,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> he <S%G118>strive<s%> <S%G3545>lawfully.<s%>
The <S%G1092>husbandman<s%> that <S%G2872>laboreth<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be first <S%G3335>partaker<s%> <S%G4413><s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2590>fruits.<s%>

Consider <S%G3539><s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say;<s%> <S%G1063>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G4907>understanding<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things.<s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> was <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I suffer <S%G2553>trouble,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> an evil <S%G2557>doer,<s%> even <S%G3360>unto<s%> <S%G1199>bonds;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1210>bound.<s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G5278>endure<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> for the elect's <S%G1223>sakes,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1588><s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> may <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5177>obtain<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> we <S%G5278>suffer,<s%> we shall <S%G2532>also<s%> reign <S%G4821>with<s%> him: <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G720>deny<s%> him, he <S%G2548>also<s%> will <S%G720>deny<s%> us: <S%G2248><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> we believe <S%G569>not,<s%> yet <S%G1565>he<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G4103>faithful:<s%> he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

Of these <S%G5023>things<s%> put them in <S%G5279>remembrance,<s%> <S%G1263>charging<s%> them <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> that they strive not about <S%G3054>words<s%> <S%G3361><s%> to no <S%G1519>profit,<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G5539><s%> but <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2692>subverting<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G191>hearers.<s%>

Study <S%G4704><s%> to <S%G3936>show<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%> unto <S%G2316>God,<s%> a <S%G2040>workman<s%> that needeth not to be <S%G422>ashamed,<s%> rightly <S%G3718>dividing<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4026>shun<s%> <S%G952>profane<s%> and vain <S%G2757>babblings:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they will <S%G4298>increase<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> will <S%G2192>eat<s%> <S%G3542><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> doth a <S%G1044>canker:<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5372>Philetus;<s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> have <S%G795>erred,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%> is <S%G1096>past<s%> <S%G2235>already;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G396>overthrow<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G5100>some.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%G3305><s%> the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2476>standeth<s%> <S%G4731>sure,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4973>seal,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> them that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G848>his.<s%> <S%G2532>And,<s%> Let every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G3687>nameth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G93>iniquity.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> there <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G693>silver,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G3585>wood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3749>earth;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G819>dishonor.<s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1571>purge<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5130>these,<s%> he shall <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G37>sanctified,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> meet for the master's <S%G2173>use,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1203><s%> and <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G4236>meekness<s%> <S%G3811>instructing<s%> those that oppose <S%G475>themselves;<s%> if God <S%G3379>peradventure<s%> <S%G2316><s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1922>acknowledging<s%> of the <S%G225>truth;<s%>
